recipe.title: How to Make Pumpkin Scones
recipe.intro: Pumpkin scones are a Queensland specialty. They became famous because of Lady Flo Bjelke-Petersen, a former governor's wife. They are soft, sweet, and golden.
recipe.ingredients: self-raising flour, butter, sugar, mashed pumpkin, egg, milk, salt
steps: **Cook** the pumpkin until soft, then **mash** it and let it cool.
**Mix** the flour, sugar, and salt in a large bowl.
**Rub** the butter into the flour with your fingertips.
**Add** the mashed pumpkin, egg, and a little milk. **Stir** until the dough is soft.
**Shape** the dough into rounds on a floured tray. **Bake** for 15 to 18 minutes until golden. **Serve** warm with butter!

review.text: Muddy's CafÃ© is a great spot for breakfast near the lagoon. I went there last Tuesday and tried their pumpkin scones. They were soft and a little bit sweet. The butter melted on the warm scone. So good! My friend had a banana smoothie. The cafÃ© has outdoor seating with shade, which is nice because it is always hot in Cairns. The staff were very kind and quick. I will come back again soon.

quiz2.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"My friend had a banana smoothie."

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: Actually, I want to try something different. Do you have pumpkin scones?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Yes, we do! They just came out of the oven five minutes ago.

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: Oh, perfect! I love them warm. One pumpkin scone, please.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Would you like butter or jam with it?

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: Just butter, please. And my usual flat white.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: One flat white with one sugar, right?

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: You remember! Yes, that is right.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Of course! That will be nine dollars fifty.

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: Here you go. Keep the change!

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Thank you, Emma! Enjoy your scone!

part_a.full_text: Welcome to our cooking show! Today we are making pumpkin scones. First, you need to cook the pumpkin. I like to use the microwave because it is faster. Cook it for about eight minutes. Then mash it with a fork. Make sure the pumpkin is cool before you add it to the flour. If it is too hot, the butter will melt. Nobody wants melted butter in their scone dough! Now mix everything together gently. Do not mix too much.

gaps.after: before you add it to the flour.

part_b.full_text: Hello! Welcome to the Cairns Farmers Market. We are selling fresh pumpkin scones today. We bake them this morning at five o'clock. Each scone is two dollars fifty, or you can get a bag of four for eight dollars. We also have pumpkin soup and pumpkin bread. Everything is made with local Queensland pumpkin. The pumpkin comes from a farm in Atherton Tablelands, about one hour from Cairns. Would you like to try a free sample?

try_it.example: A man comes to our cafÃ© every morning. He always orders a flat white and a pumpkin scone. Today I said 'The usual?' and he smiled and said 'Yes, please!'
